title: "Machine learning trims tuning time for electron beam by 65 percent"
excerpt: "The method reduces tuning time for the Linac Coherent Light Source (LCLS), the Department of Energy's free-electron laser user facility. The method frees operators to focus on other critical tasks and potentially saves hundreds of hours of experiment preparation time per year."
